sentences.english: The banks can handle foreign exchange purchase for official foreign visit groups.
sentences.chinese: 銀行可按當日牌價爲您辦理人民幣與外幣的兌換。

sentences.english: Joint ventures shall not pay foreign currency or foreign exchange certificate to the aforesaid establishments.
sentences.chinese: 不得向合營企業收取外幣或外匯兌換券。

sentences.english: Check the cash in foreign exchange at any time.
sentences.chinese: 隨時抽查外幣兌換的現金。

sentences.english: VIII. How does one calculate individual income tax for foreign currency income earned by foreign individuals?
sentences.chinese: 外籍個人取得的所得爲外幣的如何計算稅款？

sentences.english: At the Bank of China or at the foreign exchange desk in your hotel.
sentences.chinese: 在中國銀行或在你住的旅館裏的外幣兌換處。

sentences.english: Banks can handle the exchange between RMB and foreign currencies at current quotations on the day.
sentences.chinese: 銀行可按當日牌價爲您辦理人民幣與外幣的兌換。

sentences.english: Our bank opens accounts for seven types of foreign currencies.
sentences.chinese: 我們銀行辦理七種外幣的存款。

sentences.english: Our bank opens accounts for seven types of foreign currencies. Which one would you like?
sentences.chinese: 我們銀行辦理七種外幣的存款。您想要哪種？

sentences.english: Perform foreign currency exchange and other cashiering functions.
sentences.chinese: 完成好外幣兌換和出納的正常工作程序。

sentences.english: EverBank also offers deposit accounts in foreign currencies.
sentences.chinese: 此外，EverBank還提供外幣存款賬戶。

sentences.english: She  commuted some foreign currency to domestic.
sentences.chinese: 她把一些外幣換成本國貨幣。

sentences.english: The "foreign currency" refers to a currency other than the functional currency of an enterprise.
sentences.chinese: 外幣是企業記賬本位幣以外的貨幣。

sentences.english: The foreign-exchange reserves, then, represent no more than the asset side of a balance sheet, against which the central bank holds liabilities.
sentences.chinese: 因此，外匯儲備不過是兌成了外幣的央行負債而已。

sentences.english: Do you know where the foreign exchange kiosk is?
sentences.chinese: 我需要換錢，你知道外幣兌換處在哪？

sentences.english: You can convert the unused RMB back into foreign currency.
sentences.chinese: 您可以把沒有用完的人民幣兌換成外幣。

sentences.english: The foreign exchange clerk has just given the customer the exchange rate for changing Japanese yen into US dollars.
sentences.chinese: 兌換外幣的行員剛把日圓兌換成美金的匯率告訴顧客。

definition: hook (on which to hang sth)/to couple/to link together/to establish contact with/hook/coupling links (e.g. between two railway coaches)
remittance/funds paid to a bank account
to borrow or lend money/debit and credit items on a balance sheet
to repay a debt in full/to redeem/to clear
